replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙u⊙ 于 2020-2-13 21:02 编辑 

获取一个东西
give @s stone{custom:1b} 1复制代码



检测副手是否有这个东西
execute as @a if data entity @s Inventory[{Slot:-106b}].tag.custom run say foo复制代码



向前射出一支箭
#execute as @a at @s run...
tag @s add player
summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["marker"]}
summon minecraft:arrow ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["aw"]}
execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,tag=marker,distance=..0.1] at @s run function foo:bar
execute anchored eyes run teleport @e[type=minecraft:arrow,tag=aw] ^ ^ ^2.5
tag @s remove player
tag @e remove aw复制代码
#foo:bar
execute positioned 0.0 0.0 0.0 rotated as @a[tag=player] run teleport @s ^ ^ ^1
data modify entity @e[type=arrow,tag=aw,distance=..0.1,limit=1] Motion set from entity @s Pos
kill @s复制代码


脑测可行。把后面比较麻烦的给写出来了，这三个怎么拼接起来就靠你自己了...
